Class StringDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Date
      • bilancio.StringDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<Date>

    public class StringDate
extends Date
    This class represents a Date formatted as dd/MM/yyyy, omitting the hour
    Version:
    Author:
    Mirco Romagnoli
    See Also:
    Date, Serialized Form
